column3: Hmm, the point is for the 32-bit/64-bit to match the installer and we don't allow translating the installer either.\n
IMHO it is nice to be able to have correct translated words for these, even if it then doesn't match installer strings.\n
If you still want to do this at least parametrize the message to `tr("(%1-bit)").arg(...)` so that translators don't have to translate 32-bit and 64-bit separately.\n

@laanwj Seems totally unrelated: `*** No rule to make target `locale/bitcoin_pam.ts', needed by `distdir'.  Stop.`

Seems I deleted bitcoin_pam.ts by mistake... weird.

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/ceb8e226ef601dc24b32e1bd11184aeda4939257 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
